Texto: 
as above.
axial t2-weighted mr images demonstrate lack of a cerebellar vermis, a "bat-wing" appearance of the fourth ventricle, a "molar tooth" appearance to the superior cerebellar peduncles.
joubert syndrome
joubert syndrome (pathognomonic)
4 year old male with developmental delay, mental retardation, and abnormal eye movements.
